flawed_nl_solution:
The sum of his scores across the first 3 subjects is 50+70+66 = <<50+70+66=168>>168
The average score over the 3 subjects which is his History score is = total/3 = 168/3 = <<168/3=56>>56
Therefore his score across all 4 subjects = 168+56 = <<168+56=224>>224

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 186, not 168. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
